files.starHint: Star files or folders to find them faster
files.recentHint: Open a folder to see it here

actions.apply: အသုံးပြုပါ

messages.deleteConfirm: ဤအရာကို ဖျက်လိုသည်မှာ သေချာပါသလား?

messages.deleteFailed: ဖျက်၍ မရပါ

messages.uploadFailed: အပ်လုဒ် မအောင်မြင်ပါ

messages.authError: Session expired. Please log in again.
messages.permissionDenied: You don't have permission to perform this action
messages.fileTooLarge: File too large. Maximum size is 2GB.
